setup_commands: (command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba env create -p ./env python=3.10 pip -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda env create -p ./env python=3.10 pip -y) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, creating venv instead" && python3 -m venv ./env)
./env/bin/pip install loguru click pandas numpy tqdm

(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba env create -p ./env_py37 python=3.7 -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda env create -p ./env_py37 python=3.7 -y) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, creating venv for py37 instead" && python3.7 -m venv ./env_py37)
./env_py37/bin/pip install torch==1.9.0 torchvision==0.10.0 numpy==1.21.0 tqdm pybind11
